title: Long queues at filling station since Friday (18) morning
content: Long queues were seen at filling stations in many parts of the island on Friday (18) as well. The Ceypecto Filling Station in Baddegama started pumping fuel for vehicles at 8 am on Friday (18), and even before it opened, there was a long queue.At the same time, there was NO Auto Diesel from Ceypecto Filling Stations in Minneriya for two days. Meanwhile, long queues were observed at the Hingurakgoda Co-operative Fuel Station and Ceypecto Fuel Station since Friday (18) morning.
